Package org.apache.mesos.offer.constrain

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AttributeSelector
    Implements a check against a provided attribute string, determining whether it matches some criteria.
    PlacementRule
    Implements placement constraint logic on an offer, filtering out the Resources which are not to be used according to the filter logic.
    PlacementRuleGenerator
    Dynamically creates PlacementRules which depend on the current deployed state of the system.
    TaskTypeGenerator.TaskTypeConverter
    Given a TaskInfo, returns a type string for that task.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AgentRule
    This rule enforces that a task be placed on a provided agent ID, or enforces that the task avoid that agent ID.
    AgentRule.AvoidAgentGenerator
    Ensures that the given Offer is NOT located on the specified agent ID.
    AgentRule.AvoidAgentsGenerator
    Ensures that the given Offer is NOT located on any of the specified agent IDs.
    AgentRule.RequireAgentGenerator
    Ensures that the given Offer is located on the specified agent ID.
    AgentRule.RequireAgentsGenerator
    Ensures that the given Offer is located on one of the specified agent IDs.
    AgentRuleTest
    Tests for AgentRule.
    AndRule
    Wrapper for one or more another rules which returns the AND/intersection of those rules.
    AndRule.Generator
    Wraps the result of the provided PlacementRuleGenerators in an AndRule.
    AndRuleTest
    Tests for AndRule.
    AttributeRule
    Requires that the Offer contain an attribute whose string representation matches the provided string.
    AttributeRule.Generator
    A generator which returns an AttributeRule for the provided attribute.
    AttributeRuleTest
    Tests for AttributeRule.
    AttributeSelector.RegexSelector
    Implements regex support for agent attribute comparisons.
    AttributeSelector.StringSelector
    Implements exact string matching support for agent attribute comparisons.
    HostnameRule
    This rule enforces that a task be placed on the specified hostname, or enforces that the task avoid that hostname.
    HostnameRule.AvoidHostnameGenerator
    Ensures that the given Offer is NOT located on the specified hostname.
    HostnameRule.AvoidHostnamesGenerator
    Ensures that the given Offer is NOT located on any of the specified hostnames.
    HostnameRule.RequireHostnameGenerator
    Ensures that the given Offer is located at the provided hostname.
    HostnameRule.RequireHostnamesGenerator
    Ensures that the given Offer is located at one of the specified hostnames.
    HostnameRuleTest
    Tests for HostnameRule.
    MaxPerAttributeGenerator
    Ensures that the given Offer’s attributes each have no more than N instances of the task type running on them.
    MaxPerAttributeGeneratorTest
    Tests for MaxPerAttributeGenerator.
    NotRule
    Wrapper for another rule which returns the NOT result: Resources which the wrapped rule removed.
    NotRule.Generator
    Wraps the result of the provided PlacementRuleGenerator in a NotRule.
    NotRuleTest
    Tests for NotRule.
    OrRule
    Wrapper for one or more another rules which returns the OR/union of those rules.
    OrRule.Generator
    Wraps the result of the provided PlacementRuleGenerators in an OrRule.
    OrRuleTest
    Tests for OrRule.
    PassthroughGenerator
    Directly returns the provided rule when invoked.
    PassthroughRule
    A PlacementRule which performs no filtering.
    PlacementUtils
    This class provides Utilities for commonly needed Placement rule scenarios.
    TaskTypeGenerator
    This rule ensures that the given Offer is colocated with (or never colocated with) the specified task 'type', whose retrieval from the TaskInfo is defined by the developer's implementation of a TaskTypeGenerator.TaskTypeConverter.
    TaskTypeGenerator.TaskTypeLabelConverter
    Implementation of TaskTypeGenerator.TaskTypeConverter which expects a Label which provides the task type.
    TaskTypeRuleGeneratorTest
    Tests for TaskTypeGenerator.
    TestPlacementUtils
